lyrics.line: People say words can't hurt but I know from experience that's not true
You look so small. You look so weak.
Jasper, a little to the right.
Oh. You look wrong.

So I'm short. I stayed in the ground a little too long. Got a little smushed, , but maybe I'm okay like this. And maybe she's blowing things out of proportion 'cause she's got her own issues to work out.
What?
Who knows but what I do know is I can always say, hey I don't appreciate that.
Who cares what you think, runt? Jasper rampages and tears apart the set in the background
Just be you. It's up to them to realize they're being the bully. Jasper stops, steps in from of camera beside Amethyst
No one deserves to be made fun of because of how they look. If you catch yourself making harmful comments, maybe think about where that anger is coming from.
Great cut!
How do you keep your cool like that? This is soo much pressure.
Pressure made me who I am.
Wow.
Almost done! Steven, get the hubcaps!
Hubbing it up!
Hub it good! This is a high-profile job.
You mean cause it's the mayor's election-mobile?
If we do this right, we might get political favors!
I'm not sure what that is, but I like it! Mayor
Hey, hey, hey! I'm not paying for father-son bonding here! Universe! Control that kid.
Steven! Hehe, I'm sorry, Mayor Dewey. Hehe, this one's on the house. Mayor
On the house, eh. I like the way you do business, Universe. Car
Mayor Dewey! Mayor Dewey! Mayor Dewey!
Political favors!
Ahh, you rascal! Enough with the hose fights!
Aw, okay.
What the? Steven and
Whoa!
What is with this cat?
Haha! Got you guys!
Amethyst!
Uh, pretty cool, Amethyst.
Really cool! I wish I could shapeshift like you!
You could probably learn.
Really?
Sure. You've got a gem.
Whup! Magic stuff. Should I get out of here? Is there going to be an explosion?
Oh, it's no big deal dad.
Yeah, it's fine.
Aah!
Hey Pearl. Arp, arp!
Do more!
Check it out. Aawwooo! Raaa!
Whoa!
Amethyst, you're overdoing it.
Uh, chill it dude.
Just because you can shapeshift, doesn't mean you should.
Can you shapeshift?
Well of course...
Well of course I can, I'm perfect! WOMP! WOMP!
All Gems have shapeshifting powers, Steven. We can turn into objects, we can change parts of our bodies or... we could do that.
WOMP! WOMP!
I want to try it all!
Don't bite off more than you can chew, Steven.
WOMP, WOMP!
Ugh!
Alright! Show me how to change into a, uh, huge lion!
Actually, for once Pearl is right. If you're gonna do this, you've gotta start with something easy.
Like that cat you turned into?
That sounds good. Now follow my lead. First, think of what you wanna be, and then, just shake it out. See? Haha! Now your turn.
Okay. Caaatttt!
Nah, you're too tense. Just relax and feel it. Bio-rhythms, yo.
Feeeelll iittt.
Ehh, if you're not ready, we can try later.
No, wait! I can do it. Yeah, yeah. HUH!
Well, it was a good try. Cat
Rraow, rraow!
This is so cool!
You should go show your dad. He's gonna freak out! Cat
Rreow!
Dad, I'm back!
Hey, stu-ball.
Check it out! I shapeshifted my finger into a cat!
Whoa! Is, is that a thing you can do now? That's pretty... cool.
I know, right! I'm gonna take this show on the road! Cat
Meow! Row! Reaw!
That'll be a dollar 'o five Steven.
Mm, okay. Here's a nickel. And a buck! *hold up cat finger* Sadie and
Whaaat!?!
Oh Steven, that's adorable! Are... you making it purr?
It kinda does what it wants.
Really? Yow!
See what I mean? Bad cat finger!
Oh, I'm sure it just wants to play.
You're right! And he doesn't have any friends.
Oh my gosh. It's just like you, Steven.
Huh haa! Cat
Rraaooow!
Hey, Peedee! Whoa, you work the deep-fryer now? Make me some fry bits!
Steven, I take my job seriously, please use the actual menu.
Give me the bits! The bits!
Alright listen, it'll be over sooner if you just give him what he wants.
Whoa, hey, hey, it's not for me. It's fo' THESE GUYS.
What the?!
Uh, here's your... ... bits.
I can't look away.
Steven, that is freakish.
No it's not. It's natural. Sha-ake... it... out! See! Peedee and
Whoa!
You know who would love this? Your older brother. Yo Ronaldo!
What's up daa... I've gotta take a pic for Keep Beach City Weird! Cat
MEOW!
What's that?
It's my blog. Keep! Beach! City! Weird!
Can I see the picture? v Yikes! Sorry guys. I guess cat fingers don't function well as... fingers.
Tsk, I'm just getting a snack!
Steven! Need some help?
Nah, i-it's cool.
Oh gooood! See ya later then.
Huh?
We're taking the Gem Sloop out to sea to fight a living island.
What? Uh, Amethyst, wait!
I wanna go on the Gem Sloop! I wanna see a living island! WAIT! WAIT! WAIT!
Steven!
C'mon, you can make it!
Steven, what's going on?
Waah! I-it's nothing! I-i just turned all my fingers into cats!
We have to stay and help Steven!
We can't. This is a tectonic emergency. We'll deal with Steven when we get back.
Amethyst, I blame YOU for this.
Eah, that's fair.
Grrr! Steven, just try to stay calm!
Enough! No more cat fingers! I want Steven fingers! ... And I don't mean little me heads on fingers, I mean my REGULAR fingers! Wha! Aahhh! Stop! Amethyst! Pearl! ... Garnet! *gasp* Dad!
Hello? Who's there? We're closed, come back tomorooaaaah!!!
Dad!
Huh? Steven?
Dad! Help! Eeeeer!! The cat fingers are taking over my body! Eeeeer!!
Hold on, wha- I'll get you out of there!
No! Bad! Bad cat fingers!
Can't you make them go away?

I tried, but it made it worse! Ohh, my life is over! I can't go on magic adventures! I can't even open the fridge! And I'll never get to have another water fight with you, Dad! Because these things hate... water! They hate water! Dad, spray me again!
Aaahahahaaahhh!
It's not enough water! Turn on the super-wash!
No, I won't do it! It's too dangerous!
You've got to! I'm a monster! I'm an adorable cat monster!
No you're not! You're my son!
Dad! Please! Aahhh!
Dad. We did it.
Steven! Okay, let me see it. W-? Y-you got them to go away?
It just goes to show, always listen to me, and never listen to Amethyst.
That's fair.
It goes to show, you should have a little more faith in Steven.
Yeah, that would have been a total CAT-tastrophe! Amethyst and
Hahahahaha...
But I'm feeling much better MEOW!
Ehhh? What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?
Okay, that's enough.
Wait, I've been coming up with cat jokes all morning. You guys, I'm FELINE fine. Everything's PURRRRFECT! Oh come on! I'm just KITTEN around!
Hey Mr. Postman, bring me a post, bring me the post that I love the most. Huh? My song came true! Do you have a package for me today?
Hold on. Let me see what I've got here. Did you order a loaf of bread with a stamp on it?
No.
Did you order a jury summons for R.J. Finkle?
That's not me, I'm Steven.
Oh, right, right, right, Steven! Here it is, Steven Universe.
Ha! This thing is gonna help me save the world.
Really? It says it's from Wacky Sacks Supply Company.
Garnet, Amethyst, and Pearl think I shouldn't go on magic adventures because I don't know how to use my Gem powers—
That seems reasonable.
But there are other ways I can help.
With a Wacky Sack?
Exactly!
Do you know how you can save my world? Sign here, please.
Aah!
Barb yells at me if I don't get signatures.
That's awful. Garnet, Amethyst, and Pearl are back!
Wait, Steven! What is a Wacky Sack?!
Huh?
Hello, Steven.
Amethyst, we do not need that! It's not going to fit in the fridge!
What? I got this.
Look, it fits!
Oh, man. We can make a big omelet, or a quiche, or big sunny side ups!—
We fought a giant bird. We're only here for a second, we've got to go back out.
What? Why?

We have to place this Moon Goddess Statue on the top of the Lunar Sea Spire before midnight. Without it, the whole place will fall apart! Oh, Steven, you should have seen the spire in its heyday. It was an oasis for Gems on Earth. It's abandoned now, but we can still save it with this statue!
Wha? That's perfect!
What? Why?
Because I can help carry it for you in this!
A hamburger?

It's a Cheeseburger Backpack, shaped like a cheeseburger! Aww, I blew it. I was just going to wear it one day, and you guys would be like, "Dang, Steven, that's so cool." But this is obviously important Gem business.
Yes, so you should let us take care of it.
What? I'm a Gem!
But you've still got a lot to learn.
So, let him come! It'll be educational.
Hmm, alright. You can carry it in your hamburger.
Hmm. Check this out! Everything's a pocket! Even the cheese is a pocket! I could fit a lot more stuff in here. Give me a minute. I'll pack extra supplies.
Mr. Queasy! You're definitely gonna come in handy!
Steeeven, let's gooo!
Coming!
Woah, Steven, did you bring your whole room?
Back that thang up.
Let's warp.
Suck it in, Steven!
Do you remember how to do this? Keep your head in. Come on.
Whoa, the Sea Spire!
It wasn't like this a hundred years ago.
I'm sensing structural instability.
Oh, yeah. That's never good.
Gah, Steven!
What?
Alright, hold on. We're taking Steven back!
Oh, Mr. Queasy!
Steven! This place is your heritage. I want you to stay and help, but you really got to take this seriously! Can you do that, Steven?
You got it, dude!
Yesss...
Enough, we have to move.
What's the hold-up? We can clear this easily.
No. The magic that sustains the whirlpool creates a vortex that will pull us below.
So we can't jump?
Oh, wait!
What are those for?
They were for keeping warm, but check it out.
Steven!
Wait!
He's getting sucked down!
Steven!
Cheeseburger!
Steven! Way to go! C'mon, guys! Steven style!
Don't ever do that again!
Sorry!
But it was pretty great.

Oh, no, no, no, this is even worse than the outside. Ugh... that's... oh! Oh, this didn't used to be so— Oh, and the water damage. This pillar... Oh, and this had a head... Oh, Steven, once the statue's in place, it'll restore all of this to its former glory — aaah!
What was that goober?
Crystal Shrimp.
You guys, we got a problem!
It's an infestation. And we have to pass through there to get to the top.
Can't you just squish 'em?

Don't touch that, their shards are deadly! We need to clear a path. Amethyst, if you go around to the side and disturb them with a spin attack... And Garnet, if you move to the ceiling and strike this exact spot... then I can advance with my...
Bagel sandwich!
Brilliant.
Oh hey, what do you know.
Uh, uhh, how did you know that would work?
Well, if I were a shrimp, that's what I would do.
You are a shrimp.
I just want everyone to
my plan would have also worked.
Watch out!
What are we gonna do?
What? Me?
What have you got?
Cheeseburger backpack! Cheeseburger backpack! Pearl, c'mon.
Oh, alright. Pearl &
Cheeseburger backpack! Cheeseburger backpack! Cheeseburger backpack!
A raft!
Steven, that's so sensible!
Good idea anyway, Steven.
Yeah, they can't all be winners.
This is it. The Moon Goddess pedestal. And the moon is almost overhead! It's not too late to save this piece of history!
Steven, the statue.
Uhh, I, uh, ah, uhh...
What's the hold-up?
I don't have it.
What?!
I must have left it on the bed!
There's... there's no time...
Wait! I have an idea!
Could that work? Mr.
Kid, don't shake me.
Everyone, keep steady!
No, no, no, no, no!
This is all my fault. I broke it.
No, Steven, the Spire was falling apart when we got here. You handled everything well under pressure. You did great!
Yeah, two out of four of your ideas worked. That's fifty percent.
Yeah. I guess you're right. They can't all be winners. Wooo! Pearl &
Cheeseburger backpack! Cheeseburger backpack! Cheeseburger backpack!
It's a three-hour paddle home.
Anyone want a wet bagel?
Hey, I'm Smokey Quartz.
And I'm the lovely Sardonyx. SMOKEY
Sardonyx and I look pretty different. She's got three gems, I've got two. She's got four arms, I've got three. Her body can rotate 360-degrees. Hey, cut. Just give me a minute. CUT

INT. DRESSING ROOM Smokey Quartz runs to the dressing room to look in the mirror with a pessimistic gaze. The cameraman runs behind and records from a corner of the room. Sardonyx peeks inside, unable to fit her whole body inside leaving her laid down with elbows upright.
Smokey? SMOKEY
I know how this thing is about how we both have amazing bodies and stuff but yours is obviously more amazing than mine.
But that's not true! I know you look up to me— SMOKEY
Yeah, you're twenty feet tall!
But you can do things I can't do SMOKEY
Tch, like what?
Like fitting into your dressing room. Both laugh SMOKEY
Okay, okay you win. Or I guess I win. Hey, you think there's still time for my triple-handed yoyo tricks?
I hope so, I'd hate to think comparing yourself to me might have hurt your chance for you to be you. Let's get back out there! Sardonyx struggles to leave the door frame SMOKEY
A little help?
Please, don't film this. OUTRO SEQUENCE
